text: unhonne allaah se hatakar apane dharmagyaataon aur sansaar-tyaagee santon aur marayam ke bete eesa ko apane rab bana lie hai - haalaanki unhen isake siva aur koee aadesh nahin diya gaya tha ki akele ishti-poojy kee ve bandagee karen, jisak siva koee aur poojy nahin. usakee mahima ke pratikool hai vah shirk jo ye log karate hai.
